page.title: 02 HOUSING-HAZELWOOD ESTATE
page.content: {Hazelwood} is a small private estate of houses built since 1950. The roads on the estate are unmade and apart from a {small community hall} used for parties and social functions there are no amenities. The {471 bus} links Hazelwood with Orpington,Cudham, Pratts Bottom and Knockholt, but only operates once every 2 to 3 hours. The estate is surrounded by farmland, used mainly for animal rearing. ********** On the opposite side of the road to Hazelwood is {Endsleigh Cattery}, licenced to board 64 cats. The cats come from an area 15 miles in radius including West Wickham, Croydon Dartford and Forest Hill. Each cat has a separate pen with a small wooden house with a cushion and carpeting. The cats are fed twice a day and kept scrupulously clean.
